org.apache.ignite

Interface IgniteDataLoader.Updater<K,V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing interface:
    IgniteDataLoader<K,V>

    public static interface IgniteDataLoader.Updater<K,V>
extends Serializable
    Updates cache with batch of entries. Usually it is enough to configure IgniteDataLoader.allowOverwrite(boolean) property and appropriate internal cache updater will be chosen automatically. But in some cases to achieve best performance custom user-defined implementation may help.

    Data loader can be configured to use custom implementation of updater instead of default one using IgniteDataLoader.updater(IgniteDataLoader.Updater) method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(IgniteCache<K,V> cache, Collection<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries)
      Updates cache with batch of entries.

        Updates cache with batch of entries.
